short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Preview .stflow files as charts on GitHub using Text2Chart.js

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Text2Chart GitHub Previewer is developed to preview Text2hart cupported file hosted on Github without leaving the site. Currently, only Flowcharts ( stflow extension) are supported. You can install relevant vscode plugin for offline visualization of Text2Chart files.
